name: SKTextureAtlas
desc: A collection of textures optimized for storage and drawing performance.

items.name: func textureNamed(String) -> SKTexture
items.desc: Creates a texture from data stored in the texture atlas.

items.name: init(named: String)
items.desc: Creates a texture atlas from data stored in the app bundle.

items.name: init(dictionary: [String : Any])
items.desc: Creates a texture atlas from a set of image files.

items.name: func preload(completionHandler: () -> Void)
items.desc: Loads an atlas objectâ€™s textures into memory, calling a completion handler after the task completes.

items.name: class func preloadTextureAtlases([SKTextureAtlas], withCompletionHandler: () -> Void)
items.desc: Loads the textures of multiple atlas objects into memory, calling a completion handler after the task completes.

items.name: class func preloadTextureAtlasesNamed([String], withCompletionHandler: (Error?, [SKTextureAtlas]) -> Void)
items.desc: Loads the textures of multiple atlases into memory, calling a completion handler after the task completes.

items.name: var textureNames: [String]
items.desc: The names of the texture images stored in the atlas.
